response.overview: This incredible collection of rally crashes and outright disasters shows you how the Flying Finns, Swedes and Norwegians find their limits the hard way! We've captured OVER 300 of the best and worst of their rallying mishaps, day and night, on dirt and snow in a staggering variety of different cars. You'll be amazed how many just walk away from the wreckage - and none received serious injuries. Hair-raising on-board camera footage feature with hundreds of events spanning more than ten years.
response.title: Crash Kings Rallying
